detail_desc: Calf-length kaftan in a viscose and linen weave with a panel in a contrasting colour with narrow pleats around the opening and a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Wide, 3/4-length puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the cuffs, pockets in the side seams and slits in the sides.

Wide, V-neck shirt jacket in cotton twill with a concealed zip down the front, yoke at the back and concealed elasticated drawstring at the waist. Flap chest and front pockets, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with a tab and press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a lace-covered V-neck front and back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a lace-covered V-neck front and back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and matching chinos. Shirt in cotton poplin with a grandad collar, classic front, yoke at the back, chest pocket and rounded hem. Chinos in a linen and cotton weave. Relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, adjustable, elasticated waist, diagonal side pockets and a welt back pocket.

Top in crinkled jersey with broderie anglaise. Wide neckline, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the hem with ties at the sides and a flounced trim.
